attributes.description:
""Search and extract leads specifically from LinkedIn.com within the user's business domain using the provided keywords and attributes.  Focus on finding prospects that are directly relevant to the user's industry/domain on LinkedIn.  Use LinkedIn search, company pages, and professional networking features to identify relevant professionals and decision-makers.  Ensure all leads are from LinkedIn profiles of individuals operating in or serving the specified business domain.  Filter out leads that don't match the domain criteria. Try with different search strategies to find leads every time you use the tool
User Input: Business Domain: doctors working in hospitals Target Clients: ['ceo', 'founder', 'president', 'director', 'doctor'] Campaign Agenda: book a demo Maximum Leads: 200 Search Depth: 3
IMPORTANT: Focus ONLY on LinkedIn.com for lead generation. IMPORTANT: Aim to generate EXACTLY 200 leads.  CRITICAL: Continue searching and extracting leads until you reach the target of 200 leads. Do not stop until you have found the full number of leads requested. IMPORTANT: Send only json input to the tools.
WORKFLOW: 1. Use 'Search the internet with Serper' to find LinkedIn profiles using site:linkedin.com searches 2. Extract lead information (name, company, title, linkedin_url) from search results 3. Focus on finding high-quality leads with complete information (name, company, title) 4. Email addresses will be found by a separate email finder agent 5. Combine all the leads from different search strategies into the required JSON format with email field empty/null 6. CRITICAL: If you haven't reached 200 leads, continue with different search strategies:
   - Try different keyword combinations
   - Search for different job titles in the domain
   - Look for company-specific searches
   - Use industry-specific terms
   - Search for different locations or regions
   - Continue until you have exactly 200 leads
"
"

attributes.description:
""Find email addresses for leads using multiple search strategies and sources. For each lead without an email address, search across various online sources to locate their email.
SEARCH STRATEGIES: 1. Company website search: "[Name] [Company] email" or "[Name] @ [Company]" 2. Professional directories: Search for the person on professional platforms 3. Social media: Look for contact information on LinkedIn, Twitter, etc. 4. Industry directories: Search industry-specific directories and databases 5. Conference/event websites: Look for speaker or attendee lists 6. Press releases: Search for company press releases mentioning the person 7. GitHub/technical profiles: For tech professionals, check GitHub profiles 8. If email is not found, try to find the email address of the company by searching the company name of the lead
INPUT: JSON array of leads with name, company, title, and linkedin fields (email field may be empty)
OUTPUT: JSON array of leads with email addresses found and added to each lead object. If no email is found for a lead, keep the email field empty or null.
IMPORTANT: Use 'Search the internet with Serper' tool to perform searches. IMPORTANT: Focus on finding professional email addresses (company emails preferred over personal). IMPORTANT: Verify email format and validity before including in results. "
"

{"task": ""Find email addresses for leads using multiple search strategies and sources. For each lead without an email address, search across various online sources to locate their email.
SEARCH STRATEGIES: 1. Company website search: "[Name] [Company] email" or "[Name] @ [Company]" 2. Professional directories: Search for the person on professional platforms 3. Social media: Look for contact information on LinkedIn, Twitter, etc. 4. Industry directories: Search industry-specific directories and databases 5. Conference/event websites: Look for speaker or attendee lists 6. Press releases: Search for company press releases mentioning the person 7. GitHub/technical profiles: For tech professionals, check GitHub profiles 8. If email is not found, try to find the email address of the company by searching the company name of the lead
INPUT: JSON array of leads with name, company, title, and linkedin fields (email field may be empty)
OUTPUT: JSON array of leads with email addresses found and added to each lead object. If no email is found for a lead, keep the email field empty or null.
IMPORTANT: Use 'Search the internet with Serper' tool to perform searches. IMPORTANT: Focus on finding professional email addresses (company emails preferred over personal). IMPORTANT: Verify email format and validity before including in results. "
